Question: Guangdong Ace-Tec Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangdong Ace-Tec Co., Ltd.

Home Beauty and Healthcare Device

- 4-in-1 output with the most powerful lead-in
- Non-invasive, under NMPA application
- Comprehensive anti-aging device with built-in NTC temperature control system
- 4 lights therapy with 3 modes and hands-free usage
- Daily hair care partner with 3-in-1 output for frizz removal and smooth hair
- Deep muscle activation with EMS+Vacuum Sucking for cellulite reduction and skin firming
- Rechargeable battery, lightweight for travel
- Over 20 years of customized R&D supporting experience
- Strong design team with over 10 years of industrial design experience
- Technological innovation and cooperation with dermatology professors and photoelectric experts
- Address: 420 Jingxing Road, Xixi Industrial Zone, Liaobu Town, Donguan City, Guangdong Province, China
- Email: sales@ace-tec.com
- Contact: +86-769-8301-4680
